author: Dr. Seuss

author: Oscar Wilde

author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
quote: All that is gold does not glitter,

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

author: J.K. Rowling
quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

author: John Green
quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.

author: Maurice Switzer

author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is what happens to us while we are making other plans.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to reform or pause and reflect.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.

quote: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.

quote: Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have.

quote: The world is not a wish-granting factory.

quote: Sometimes you have to be apart from people you love, but that doesn't make you love them any less. Sometimes you love them more.

quote: If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time or the tools to write. Simple as that.

quote: If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there

quote: We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
